parameters.psuedocycles: Number of Psuedo Time (Steady) Cycles - to run before starting dual timestep time accurate simulation

parameters.rasanov: Rasanov Flux for Jacobian (True or False)

parameters.maxcfl_all: Default Max CFL Number for all Equations
parameters.maxcfl_transport: Override Max CFL Number for Transported Quantities
parameters.maxcfl_coarse: Override Max CFL Number for Coarse Meshes
parameters.multipolycfl_lower: Control of CFL for Polynomial Multigrid (Lowest Order)
parameters.multipolycfl_upper: Control of CFL for Polynomial Multigrid (Highest Order)
